channel.title: BNN Bloomberg
channel.description: BNN Bloomberg is Canada's only television service devoted exclusively to business and finance news with wall-to-wall coverage of the markets.

item.description:
Brad Lamensdorf , co-portfolio manager of the Ranger Equity Bear ETF, joins BNN Bloomberg to discuss shorting of U.S. regional banks. He says short sellers are not the issue, rather banks are plagued with bad business that are causing investors to flee the stocks.
Subscribe to BNN Bloomberg to watch more videos: https://www.youtube.com/BNNBloomberg

item.description:

item.description:
David Nelson, chief strategist at Belpointe Asset Management, joins BNN Bloomberg to discuss markets. Nelson says the debt ceiling could drive liquidity away from the markets. He also discusses AI hype and tells even if it is in a bubble, this technology will continue to fuel stocks as a result of 'investors’ greed'.

item.description:
Eric Nuttall, partner and senior portfolio manager at Ninepoint Partners, joins BNN Bloomberg for his view on Canada's energy market. Nuttall reminds investors that oil price falling doesn't set demand, He adds investors shouldn't let price set the narrative. He also discusses the reasons why he is 100% focused on Canadian heave oil producers.

item.description:
Sheila Bair, former chair at FDIC, senior fellow at Center for Financial Stability and author of the New York Times Best Seller 'Bull by the Horns', and 'Money Tales', joins BNN Bloomberg for her view on the U.S. debt ceiling debate. Bair says that even as both part are right, the debate is building anxiety. Bair also discusses the U.S. banking turmoil, noting there will be more consolidation in the U.S. financial system.
